Subject: Reka Flash 3.1 is an enhanced version of Reka Flash 3, focusing on coding and agentic tasks with improved reinforcement learning capabilities. It includes a quantization library, Reka Quant, which supports efficient memory usage and performance in resource-constrained environments. This release highlights significant advancements in reinforcement learning algorithms and scalability.
Title: Code Analysis
Summary: Reka Flash 3.1 is an enhanced version of Reka Flash 3, focusing on coding and agentic tasks with improved reinforcement learning capabilities. It includes a quantization library, Reka Quant, which supports efficient memory usage and performance in resource-constrained environments. This release highlights significant advancements in reinforcement learning algorithms and scalability.
